ShiftTemplate.name: ShiftTemplate
ShiftTemplate.description: Represents a template for creating shifts.

BackgroundColor.description: Sets a background color when shifts are displayed in the UI. Use a 3- or 6-digit hexadecimal format, for example #FF00FF. Available in API version 54.0 and later.

Description.description: Additional information about the shift like number of breaks or activities.

Duration.description: How long the shift lasts. The unit of measurement for this field is determined by ShiftTemplateDurationType.

GeoFnLcTypeAtShftEnd.description: Specifies the allowed location type for geofence validation at the end of the shift.

GeoFnLcTypeAtShftStart.description: Specifies the allowed location type for geofence validation at the start of the shift.

GeoFnNotificationType.description: Specifies the notification type for geofence validation at the start and end of the shift.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the shift is active or inactive.

IsGeoFnRqrAtShftEnd.description: Indicates whether geofencing was enabled at the end of the shift.

IsGeoFnRqrAtShftStart.description: Indicates whether geofencing was enabled at the start of the shift.

IsGeoLcRqrAtShftEnd.description: Indicates whether user's geolocation was captured at the end of the shift.

IsGeoLcRqrAtShftStart.description: Indicates whether user's geolocation was captured at the start of the shift.

IsNonStandard.description: Indicates whether the shift is nonstandard, such as overtime or on-call shifts.

JobProfileId.description: The Job Profile record. This field is optional.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the shift template was last modified. Its label in the user interface is Last Modified Date.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the shift template was last viewed.

NotificationTypeAtShftEnd.description: Specifies the notification type for open tours at the end of the shift.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the shift template.

RecordsetFilterCriteriaId.description: The ID of the recordset filter criteria selected for the shift template. Available in API version 53.0 and later.

ShiftTemplateDurationType.description: The unit of measurement for the shift template duration.

ShouldAutoEnd.description: Indicates whether the shift was automatically ended when the tour was completed.

ShouldAutoStart.description: Indicates whether the shift was automatically started when the tour began.

StartTime.description: The time of day when the shift starts.

TimeSlotType.description: The type of time slot. Possible values are: Normal Extended You can use Extended to represent overtime shifts. Available in API version 55.0 and later.
